entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make target value dynamic for iOS in CLRTest.Execute.Bash.targets #59185
    7.0.0
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Console.Write does not write anything until a new line is written #59184
  • XmlSerializer tries to use Reflection.Emit even if RuntimeFeature.IsDynamicCodeSupported is false #59167
  • Running a .NET 5 project on macOS M1 with .NET 6 leads to confusing error message #59168
  • 6.0 RC1: ImplicitUsings with .NET Framework 4.x - System.Net.Http is not available #59163
  • DOTNET_SYSTEM_NET_SOCKETS_INLINE_COMPLETIONS and UnsafePreferInlineScheduling Support #59157
  • [macOS] Potential regression in delegates invocation #59152
  • How to get property return type? #59175
  • After updating to .net6-rc1 Blazor WebAssembly's old project is not loading and new project can't build #59156
    6.0.0
  • [macOS] Potential perf regression in Timer #59150
    7.0.0
  • Potential performance regression in Array.Sort for arrays of reference types #59149
  • library_mono.js triggers apparent false-positive report from GitHub's codeql scan #59147
    6.0.0
  • Potential perf regression in Utf8Encoding.GetBytes #59146
  • Surprising performance regression on Unix VMs #59145
    6.0.0
  • Hosting .NET Core using nethost and hostfxr - Problem linking with libnethost.lib #59143
  • Creating StringBuilder with large initial capacity has regressed #59142
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails when targetting multiple frameworks without referencing STJ #59140
  • Missing XmlSerializers.dll in nupkg [Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator] #59139

Closed

  • CS8714: Dictionary<TKey, TValue> where TKey: notnull - WHY? #59179
  • System.IO.Pipelines.Pipe.ReadAsync fails to cancel on CancellationToken #58909
  • System - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54882
    6.0.0
  • Add `DateOnly` and `TimeOnly` string body parameter support #59118
  • Crossgen2 perfmap format version support #58468
    6.0.0
  • Referencing OpenTK.Graphics crashes the Ready2Run build. #59138
    6.0.0
  • ASP.NET 6 RC1 - On Cloudflare Pages - When I try to install 'wasm-tools' the build breaks. #59170
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6.0 RC 1 SDK does not install correctly on Windows 10. #59176
  • GZipStream silently returns corrupted data on decompression. #59171
  • Microsoft.Extensions packages missing .NET (Core) targets #59158
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions includes unnecessary dependencies #59161
    6.0.0
  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessary linking after `Build`, when publishing from VS #58973
    6.0.0
  • X509Certificate2.GetNameInfo(SimpleName) with non-ASCII data on Linux returns oddly encoded results. #59105
    7.0.0
  • X509Chain.Build() fails to create a valid certificate chain on Linux if two root certificates with the same subject name is added to the ExtraStore. #59148
  • WinHttp tests with Tls 1.3 are failing #58587
    6.0.0
  • Multi-targeting strategy for Json and Logging Source Generators for 6.0 NuGet packages #58536
    6.0.0
  • If you build with trimming enabled, future builds with it disabled will produce incorrect output #53612
    6.0.0
  • Cannot AOT compile with trimming disabled #53804
    6.0.0
  • .NET 6.0 does not support OLEDB #58795
  • Using Sync Method of HTTP Client (.NET 5) in .NET Framework 4.8 #59144
    7.0.0
  • ArPow stage 2: implementing source-build CI #54573
    6.0.0
  • ProcessStartInfo.Arguments follows Windows conventions on all platforms #29857
    Future
  • Process.Start doesn't work in . Net5 #59124
  • Hosting .NET Core using nethost and hostfxr - Finding nethost.dll on client machine #59082
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsSIMD(user) && (returnType == user->TypeGet())' #58897
    7.0.0
  • OSArchitecture is wrong on non-Windows #58463
  • Incorrect OS architecture reported for x86 code running on ARM64 #26612
    6.0.0
  • Add analyzer: Call async methods when in an async method #45661
    6.0.0
  • WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonated sending wrong credentials #58033
    7.0.0
  • Different results .Net 5.0 and .Net 6.0 on AES Crypto #59121
  • directory.getfiles does not take advantage of the index #59126
  • Uncorrect output on my PC on C# language #59125
  • EncryptedXml.Encrypt(XmlElement, X509Certificate) does not support rsa oaep, only insecure rsa1.5 #59127
  • Consider incrementing the assembly version for source generator with each build #58274
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix race condition with cancellation tokens in Read/Flush operations #59189
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Fix BinSkim warnings in System.IO.Compression.Native.dll #59188
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm: Use correct form of store instruction when data is float #59187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial regex source generator #59186
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [docs] Add instructions for debugging native runtime code on Android #59183
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Remove some of the restrictions on constrained calls from #59182
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [main] WasmAppBuilder: publish only once per target framework … #59181
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1364506 #59180
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Rocky Linux support #59178
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Create and publish missing symbols #59174
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.0
  • Implement UriCreationOptions #59173
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Require UTF8 encoding in GetX509NameInfo #59172
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Failing test for DI's site call factory cache #59164
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/6.0] Create a parent CMake project for building app bundles on CI #59154
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and… #59153
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • support FEATURE_INTERPRETER on linux-x64 #59137
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update area-owners.md #59131
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Fix race condition with cancellation tokens in Read/Flush operations #59090
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Update the branding to GA #59102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Harden native gate thread against affinity mask growth #59129
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #59113
  • [main] Set the publishing infra version to 3 #59165
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59070
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix environment variable using syntax for powershell #59169
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Emit diagnostics & exceptions for sourcegen handling init-only properties & JsonInclude attributes #59097
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Set the publishing infra version to 3 #59166
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: simple VN budget stress mode #59051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge main into feature/use-dllimport-generator #59119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] fix TLS 1.3 in WinHttpHandler #59159
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods #59151
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Drawing
  • [release/6.0] Avoid not live built packages dependencies that are satisifed by the shared framework in M.E.Logging.Abstractions #59162
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.0
  • Runtime changes for DetectPreviewFeaturesAnalyzer #59062
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/6.0] Harden native gate thread against affinity mask growth #59132
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.11 and v4.0 (#58446) #59074
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Remove exception messages from resource strings #59104
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] fix SendAsync from impersonificated context with default credentials #59155
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Create and publish missing symbols #58866
    area-Build-mono
  • disable tests unstable on Windows 11 #59135
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Require UTF8 encoding in GetX509NameInfo #59116
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add dependency graph viewer tool #55304
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Tell-mode][release/6.0] Use arcade power source build infra #59108
    area-Infrastructure
  • Arm64: Fix perfscore and display logic for LARGELDC #59134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix SendAsync from impersonificated context with default credentials #58922
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] WasmAppBuilder: publish only once per target framework instead of invoking publish explicitly. #59136
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Update attribute name used for controlling frame pointer elimination #59091
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #58913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods #59096
    area-System.Drawing
  • [mono] Remove duplicates from the AOT data blob. #58982
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Use caching ConsoleStream for both iOS and Android #59088
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Console, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use SROA-friendly struct type declarations #59060
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 6.0.0
  • Relax assert to check for simd8 or return type #58966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initialize compCurBB during fgInsertGCPoll #57334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Remove SupportedOSPlatforms windows on Hosting WindowsServices #59064
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change back superpmi benchmarks build to net6.0 #59130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Increment source generator assembly versions with every build #58919
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Handle file-scoped namespaces (#57894) #59100
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Update source-gen APIs according to review #59042
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Single-file apps should not use copy-on-write mapping of the .exe on windows. #59033
    area-Single-File
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Align preallocationSize behavior #59078
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measurement pool #58514
    * NO MERGE *
  • Fix corner-case handling of cancellation exception in ForEachAsync #59065
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 6.0.0
  • Mark time trigger #58261
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Expose cross-platform helpers for Vector64, Vector128, and Vector256 #53450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • Faster wasm runtime #51458
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    area-Build-mono
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
  • CI matrix change: drop OSX 10.13 #59084
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [MonoVM] Reduce P/Invoke GC transition asserts in release builds #59029
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: ubuntu #58987
  • Process.Unix: handle ETXTBSY error when executing file that was just written by .NET. #59079
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Use unsigned casts for array/Span indexers #57970
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use getpwuid(3) in corehost for the $HOME-less user #59036
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • Fix ro segments with regions #58811
    area-GC-coreclr
